name: motherB race
description:
Welcome to the motherB race !
 Embark on a race where your skill and your determination will be put to the hardest trial !

Compete against your opponent into a motherboard 8-bit style, use awesome powers and be the first to reach the processor !
                            ----------

Key Features -Compete against your opponent in a race for victory  -Catch two unique powers to gain an edge over your opponent -A pixel art game style ---------- Gameplay
 "motherB race" is a Versus Racing game where two players control electric balls and have to reach the heart of the motherboard. The game is played in three rounds on three different maps.                         ----------

Powers - Boost : gain speed -Blackout : turn off the light                                    ---------- Controls -Left Stick to move Up, Down, Left, Right -"A" to use power [!] 2 Players Only [!] You need to use an Xbox Controller ----------- Credits Igor Le Bis Gauthier - Lead Game Designer Alexandre Linel - Game Designer Rafael De Oliveira Reis- Game Designer Clément Sabrié - Graphic Designer Pierre-Louis Verguin - Lead Developper Pierre Karanfilovic - Lead Developper / Composer Julien Dor - Developper Théo Driutti - Developper Vianney Jouve - Producer / Sound Designer
